Sentencas: A novel concept of solid oxide fuel cell (SOFC), the symmetrical SOFC, that uses simultaneously the same material as both anode and cathode has been investigated.
Titulo: An all-in-one flourite-based symmetrical solid oxide fuel cell

Sentencas: Common materials typically used as anode components such as a combination of YSZ and CeO2 plus a noble metal may be considered good candidates for such a configuration at relatively high temperatures (i.e. above 900 degrees C).
Titulo: An all-in-one flourite-based symmetrical solid oxide fuel cell

Sentencas: These symmetrical electrodes exhibit enhanced electrochemical properties under both reducing and oxidising conditions, in part due to the catalytic properties of the noble metal used.
Titulo: An all-in-one flourite-based symmetrical solid oxide fuel cell

Sentencas: In air the polarisation values are improved by a factor of four compared to electrodes without CeO2, whereas under reducing conditions an improvement of two-three orders of magnitude has been observed.
Titulo: An all-in-one flourite-based symmetrical solid oxide fuel cell

Sentencas: The best results correspond to cermets containing 50-60% of CeO2.
Titulo: An all-in-one flourite-based symmetrical solid oxide fuel cell

Sentencas: This simple combination allows the assembly of all-in-one fluorite-based symmetrical fuel cells (SFCs): YSZ-CeO2/YSZ/YSZ-CeO2 Plus a noble metal with good catalytic behaviour.
Titulo: An all-in-one flourite-based symmetrical solid oxide fuel cell

Sentencas: Performances of 140 mW cm(-2) at 950 degrees C were obtained when using H-2 as fuel and thick YSZ electrolytes.
Titulo: An all-in-one flourite-based symmetrical solid oxide fuel cell

Sentencas: Interesting performances of 500 mW cm-2 are expected for thin YSZ electrolyte layer under identical experimental conditions.
Titulo: An all-in-one flourite-based symmetrical solid oxide fuel cell
An all-in-one flourite-based symmetrical solid oxide fuel cell
